text: Motion
Motion
A mini-drama, huh?

Not only are we in it, but we're singin' the theme song too...?!
Well I'll be~! This is downright excitin'~!

"For those tired from work and studies, this show is meant to
give them a breather and to renew their energy for tomorrow."

"The setting protrays a run-of-the-mill café, "Le Moment," and the
calming moments where its manager, crew, and regulars gather."
Oh I get it...

So it's pretty much a show that you can unwind to at the
end of the day. Doesn't that sound nice?

Yeah, that's the idea. Although this time,
you'll be the ones helping people unwind.

Hehe, I see.
──So, have the roles been decided yet?

They're still adjusting things around.
But seems you can voice your preferences if you have any.

The roles are the manager, crew, and the café's regulars...
The manager... would be Kogatan, right?

Of course it's gotta be me~? The napolitan I make
will knock yer socks off too~!

Uh, shouldn't it be Kiriko, though? It's going to be the
opposite of calming if the manager's anyone else.

Fufu...! I'd still like to visit...
Mamimi-chan's café too...

I'd visit too! A café with unique personalities, huh?
If it were Kiririn café... won't it have healing vibes?

If that's the case, Yuika's café would be all stylish...
And Sakuya's café sounds like it'll be real cozy~

Real cozy, huh?
Yeah, I can picture that easily.

Ain't that right~? Sakuya is really sweet~ I bet she'd come
up with tons of things to give 'em customers a good time!
Hehe... Thank you.

──But aren't you one who can say that about me?
Sounds like you're more fitting as the manager, don't you think?
